short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Counts the number of times a specified search term appears in each tab in the window.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Counts the number of times a specified search term appears in each tab in the window. 

Helpful for figuring out which tab has the most relevant information. Press Ctrl+Shift+F or click the icon to open the search box. 

After installing, the extension will not run on existing tabs. It will only work on newly loaded or refreshed tabs.
